results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of permutations of [n] with exactly k increasing runs of even length.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..180, flattened
formula: Sum_{k=1..floor(n/2)} k * T(n,k) = A097593(n). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 04 2019
maple: G:=2*(t-1)*u/(-2*u+(2-t+t*u)*exp((-1+u)*x/2)+(t-2+t*u)*exp(-(1+u)*x/2)): u:=sqrt(5-4*t): Gser:=simplify(series(G,x=0,12)): P[0]:=1: for n from 1 to 11 do P[n]:=sort(n!*coeff(Gser,x^n)) od: seq(seq(coeff(t*P[n],t^k),k=1..1+floor(n/2)),n=0..11);
